TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadStringCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadStringCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadStringCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadStringCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: Représente la méthode qui gérera l'événement d'un .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Lorsque vous créez un délégué , vous identifiez la méthode qui gérera l'événement.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Pour associer l'événement au gestionnaire d'événements, ajoutez une instance du délégué à l'événement.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Le gestionnaire d'événements est appelé chaque fois qu'un événement se produit, sauf si vous supprimez le délégué.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Pour plus d’informations sur les délégués de gestionnaires d’événements, consultez [NIB : événements et des délégués](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples L’exemple de code suivant illustre le transfert d’une chaîne de façon asynchrone.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading a string. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#38)] La méthode suivante est appelée lorsque le transfert est terminé.The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#39)]
